header.title: Installing cosFileTransfer

section.title: Installation Process
section.p: This chapter describes how to install cosFileTransferApp in an Erlang Environment.

section.title: Preparation
section.p: Before starting the installation process for cosFileTransfer, the application Orber must be running and cosProperty installed by using cosProperty:install(). Please note that it is NOT necessary to use cosProperty:install_db() for running the cosFileTransfer application.

section.title: Configuration
section.p: When starting the cosFileTransfer application the following configuration parameters can be used:

list.item: buffert_size - default is 64000. This option determine how many bytes will be read at a time when transferring files.
